180b4(khri brgyad stong pa): mi 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
180b5(khri brgyad stong pa): chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ ji ltar na chos ston par 'gyur ba lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
180b6(khri brgyad stong pa): stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rna
180b7(khri brgyad stong pa): par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam
181a1(khri brgyad stong pa): par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yongs su dag pa lags/
181a2(khri brgyad stong pa): so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor/
181a3(khri brgyad stong pa): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no// ra
181a4(khri brgyad stong pa): 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
181a5(khri brgyad stong pa): 'das ji ltar na gzugs yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ ji ltar na tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed/
181a6(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yong su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na rnam pa thams cad
181a7(khri brgyad stong pa): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs skye
181b1(khri brgyad stong pa): ba med pa dang 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byung ba med pa ni gzugs yongs su dgu pa yin no// rab 'byor tshor ba dang /
181b2(khri brgyad stong pa): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba
181b3(khri brgyad stong pa): med pa ni rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas
181b4(khri brgyad stong pa): nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor gzhan yang nam mkha' yongs su drag pa'i phyir/ shes
181b5(khri brgyad stong pa): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar nA nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
181b6(khri brgyad stong pa): phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nam mkha' ni skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mong/
181b7(khri brgyad stong pa): pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir yongs su dag pa ste/ rab 'byor nam mkha' gos pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag/
182a1(khri brgyad stong pa): pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' gos pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
182a2(khri brgyad stong pa): byin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor nam mkha' gzung du med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs/
182a3(khri brgyad stong pa): su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na na mkha' gzung du ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
182a4(khri brgyad stong pa): su dag pa lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor na mkha' smras pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin
182a5(khri brgyad stong pa): no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' smra ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags
182a6(khri brgyad stong pa): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na brag cha dang gnyis kyi sgra ji lta ba de bzhin du rab 'byor nam mkha' smra ba med pa'i phyir
182a7(khri brgyad stong pa): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor nam mkha' rab tu brjod du med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no//
182b1(khri brgyad stong pa): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' rab tu brjod du ma mchis pa'i slad du / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa
182b2(khri brgyad stong pa): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nam mkha' ni rab tu brjod pa gang yang med de/ de ltar nam mkha' rab tu brjod pa med pa'i phyir/
182b3(khri brgyad stong pa): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor na mkha' ni migs su med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no//
182b4(khri brgyad stong pa): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' dmigs pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags
182b5(khri brgyad stong pa): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lnga pa/ rab 'byor nam mkha' la ni ci yang dmigs su med do// rab 'byor de ltar na nam mkha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi
182b6(khri brgyad stong pa): pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor gzugs shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa
182b7(khri brgyad stong pa): dang kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor de
183a1(khri brgyad stong pa): bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / dmigs su med pa
183a2(khri brgyad stong pa): dang skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su
183a3(khri brgyad stong pa): dag pa yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / skye bo med pa dang /
183a4(khri brgyad stong pa): 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor chos thams
183a5(khri brgyad stong pa): cang shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i
183a6(khri brgyad stong pa): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na chos thams cad shin tu rnam par
183a7(khri brgyad stong pa): dog pa dang / dmigs su ma mtshos pa dang / skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis
183b1(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams cad shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir
183b2(khri brgyad stong pa): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
183b3(khri brgyad stong pa): pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de la ni/ mig gi nang 'byung bar mi 'gyur lags
183b4(khri brgyad stong pa): so/ rna ba'i nad dang / sna'i nad dang / lce'i nang dang / lus kyi nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur lags so// yid kyi nang 'byung bar mi 'gyur lags so// yan
183b5(khri brgyad stong pa): lag ma tshang bar mi 'gyur lags so// lus ngan par mi 'gyur lags so// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ni gshis ngan du 'gum par mi 'gyur lags so//
183b6(khri brgyad stong pa): de'i slad bzhin du chos nyan par 'tshal ba'i lha stong phrag mang po dag kyang 'brang bar 'gyur lags so// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar
183b7(khri brgyad stong pa): gyi lha rnams kyang slad bzhin du 'brang bar 'gyur lags so// gang na dam pa'i chos smra ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag chos brgyad dang / bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga dag la
184a1(khri brgyad stong pa): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di smra bar bgyid pa der/ lha'i tshogs mang po dag kyang 'du bar 'gyur lags so// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shes
184a2(khri brgyad stong pa): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di smra bar bgyid pa de ni bsod nams mang du skye bar 'gyur te/ bsod nams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma
184a3(khri brgyad stong pa): mchis pa dag kyang skyed par 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi
184a4(khri brgyad stong pa): bu mo gang tshes brgyad dang / bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga dag la lha'i 'khor gyi mdun du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spro bar byed pa de ni/ bsod nams dpag tu med/ grangs med/ bas
184a5(khri brgyad stong pa): gyis mi khyab ba gzhal du med/ brjod du ma mchis pa dag skyed par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di lta s+ho/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rin po che yin pa'i phyi
184a6(khri brgyad stong pa): rab 'byor de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di la brten nu/ sems can dbul pa las thar bar 'gyur ro// dung 'gro'i sbyi nas las thor bar 'gyur ro// ga shin
184a7(khri brgyad stong pa): 'jig rten las thar bar 'gyuraro// mau dbul po las tha bar 'gyuraro// rnam tshigs shing sngas chen pos bu rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// bram de'i rigs shing sbal chen po sasa?/
184b1(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnas su skye bar 'gyur ro// 'du shes
184b2(khri brgyad stong pa): med 'du shes med min skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i bar gyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu skyed par byed pa'o//
184b3(khri brgyad stong pa): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang // rang byang chub dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub skyed par
184b4(khri brgyad stong pa): byed pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de la brten nas rgyal rigs shing sA la
184b5(khri brgyad stong pa): chen po lta bu rnams yod pa dang / bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams yod pa dang / khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams yod pa dang / rgyal chen
184b6(khri brgyad stong pa): bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod pa
184b7(khri brgyad stong pa): dang tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don rnams yod pa dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs 'khor dang / 'od chung dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal dang / dge chung dang /
185a1(khri brgyad stong pa): tshad med dge dang / dge rgyas dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / 'du shes med pa'i sems rnams dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang /
185a2(khri brgyad stong pa): mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / ci yang med pa'i skye
185a3(khri brgyad stong pa): mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched gyi bar du 'gro ba'i lha rnams yod pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bros
185a4(khri brgyad stong pa): bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha
185a5(khri brgyad stong pa): rol tu phyin pa 'di la bsam gtan bzhi yod pa dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang
185a6(khri brgyad stong pa): tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod pa dang /
185a7(khri brgyad stong pa): yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan log dang / lam rnams yod pa dang / nang stong pa nyid yod pa dang /
185b1(khri brgyad stong pa): 'angam pa med pa' nga ba nyid stong pa cad kyi bar du 'ong pa dang / spobs bcu yod pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bani dang / ma so'ang dag par rig pa pa 'dang / sangs rgyas byachos su /
185b2(khri brgyad stong pa): pa bcwo brgyad yod pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yod pa'i phyir te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las de dag la sogs pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan pas/
185b3(khri brgyad stong pa): de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rin po che zhes bya'o// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa 'am/
185b4(khri brgyad stong pa): kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba 'am/ yongs su bzung ba 'am/ dor ba'i chos gang yang med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gang dag sde ba 'am/ 'gags
185b5(khri brgyad stong pa): med pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba 'am/ yongs su gzung ba 'am/ dor bar bya ba'i chos de dag med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha
185b6(khri brgyad stong pa): rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di la ni dge ba 'am/ mi dge ba 'am/ zag pa dang bcas pa 'am/ zag pa med pa 'am/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa 'am/ kha na mtho
185b7(khri brgyad stong pa): ba med pa'am/ nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa 'am/ nyon mongs pa med pa 'am/ 'jig rten pa 'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa 'am/ 'dus byas sam/ 'dus
186a1(khri brgyad stong pa): ma byas kyi chos gang yang dmigs su med do// rab 'byor rnam grangs des kyang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rin po che yin te/ rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa rin
186a2(khri brgyad stong pa): po che de ni/ chos gang gis kyang ma gos pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gang gis gos par 'gyur pa'i chos de dmigs su med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor des na pha
186a3(khri brgyad stong pa): rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di ni gos pa med pa yin no// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gal te de ltar 'du shes par
186a4(khri brgyad stong pa): yang mi byed/ de ltar rnam par rtog par yang mi byed/ de ltar dmigs par yang mi byed/ de ltar spros par yang mi byed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / shes
186a5(khri brgyad stong pa): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong ba yin te/ bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsti stang du bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / ri mor bya ba dang //
186a6(khri brgyad stong pa): mchod par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing du song nas kyang sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi
186a7(khri brgyad stong pa): zhing yang yongs su dag par byed do// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang yang thob par byed pa ma yin/ ston par byed pa ma yin/ 'dzin par byed pa ma yin/ sbyin
186b1(khri brgyad stong pa): par byed pa ma yin/ skyed par byed pa ma yin/ 'gag par byed pa ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs par byed pa ma yin/ rnam par byung bar byed pa ma yin/ 'grib
186b2(khri brgyad stong pa): par byed pa ma yin/ 'phel bar byed pa ma yin/ 'das pa yang ma yin/ mi 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin/ rab 'byor shes rab
186b3(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dod pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' bar byed pa ma yin/ gnas par byed pa yang ma yin/ gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs
186b4(khri brgyad stong pa): med pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' bar byed pa yang ma yin/ gnas par byed pa yang ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin//
186b5(khri brgyad stong pa): 'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin/ tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin par
186b6(khri brgyad stong pa): byed pa yang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
186b7(khri brgyad stong pa): nying stong pa nyid kyi bar du sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin/
187a1(khri brgyad stong pa): de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams sbyin par byed
187a2(khri brgyad stong pa): pa yang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin/ stob bcu sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi
187a3(khri brgyad stong pa): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/ 'dor
187a4(khri brgyad stong pa): bar byed pa yang ma yin/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
187a5(khri brgyad stong pa): nyid sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/ 'dor bar
187a6(khri brgyad stong pa): byed pa yang ma yin/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin no// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sbyin par byed pa yang
187a7(khri brgyad stong pa): ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin
187b1(khri brgyad stong pa): 'dus byas kyi khams 'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / de bzhin
187b2(khri brgyad stong pa): gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung / chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul 'di ni gnas pa nyid de/ de de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing mngon par thugs su chud de/
187b3(khri brgyad stong pa): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing / mngon par thugs su chud nas/ bsrung ba dang / rnam par 'grel ba dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / ston par mdzad pa'i phyir ro//
187b4(khri brgyad stong pa): de nas lha'i bu 'bub phrag mang po dag rab tu steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas/ ca co dang gzha'adon cing / lha'i me tog ut+pal dang / pad+ma dang / ku bu dang / pad+ma dkar po
187b5(khri brgyad stong pa): dang man da ra ba dag gis gtor nas/ 'di skad du a la la 'dzam bu'i gling du chos kyi 'khor lo lan bcu gnyis bskor ba 'di mthong ngo zhes tshig kyang brjod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu
187b6(khri brgyad stong pa): phyin pa 'di bstan pa na/ de nas lha'i bu stong phrag du ma dag gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab
187b7(khri brgyad stong pa): 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang yang 'jug par bya ba 'am/ ldog
188a1(khri brgyad stong pa): par bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ma yin pas/ rab 'byor 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba gnyis pa yang ma yin/ gcig pa yang ma yin no//
188a2(khri brgyad stong pa): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di chos gang yang 'jug par bgyi ba 'am/ ldog par bgyi ba'i slad du
188a3(khri brgyad stong pa): nye bar gnas pa ma lags pa'i dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni
188a4(khri brgyad stong pa): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo // de bzhin du bsam gtan dang / brtson 'grus dang / bzod pa dang / tshul khrims dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i
188a5(khri brgyad stong pa): pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo // nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // dran pa
188a6(khri brgyad stong pa): bar gzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong ngo // de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan
188a7(khri brgyad stong pa): lag dang / lam rnams ni lam rnams kyis stong ngo // stobs bcu ni stobs bcus stong ngo // mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
188b1(khri brgyad stong pa): 'dres pa bco brgyad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ngo // rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras cuni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus stong ngo // de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong bar/
188b2(khri brgyad stong pa): 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis
188b3(khri brgyad stong pa): stong ngo // rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol
188b4(khri brgyad stong pa): tu phyin pa 'di ni che ba lags te/ chos thams cad kyang chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyis stong la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha
188b5(khri brgyad stong pa): tu phyin pa la brten nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya yod/ chos gang yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma mchis shing /
188b6(khri brgyad stong pa): chos kyi 'khor lo yang skor la/ chos gang la yang 'jug par bgyid pa 'am/ ldog par bgyid pa yang ma mchis te/ chos gang yang yongs su mthong ba yang ma mchis la/ chos gang yang yong
188b7(khri brgyad stong pa): su ma mthong ba yang ma mchis lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar gang 'jug pa 'am ldog pa'i chos de dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du ste/ 'di ltar chos thams cad gtan mngon
189a1(khri brgyad stong pa): par ma grub pa lags pas/ stong pa nyid ni 'jug par bgyid pa 'am/ ldog par bgyid pa ma lags la/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / smon pas
189a2(khri brgyad stong pa): mchis pa yang 'jug par bgyid pa 'am/ ldog par bgyid pa ma lags so// de ltar na gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa dang / rab tu bstan pa dang / rjod pa dang
189a3(khri brgyad stong pa): gdags pa dang / 'jug pa dang / rnam par 'grel ba dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / spros pa dang / gsal bar bgyid pa dang / yang dag par rab tu ston pa 'di ni shes
189a4(khri brgyad stong pa): rab kyi rol tu phyin pa bstan pa yongs su dag pa lags so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa de yang sus kyang ma bstan/ sus kyang ma bzung lags so// gang sa
189a5(khri brgyad stong pa): kyang ma bstan sus kyang ma bzung ba de ni sras kyang mngon sum du ma bgyis lags so// gang sus kyang ma bstan/ sus kyang ma bzung / sus kyang mngon sum dum bgyis pa
189a6(khri brgyad stong pa): de la ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa su yang ma mchis te/ chos bstan pa 'di la su la yang sbyin gnas su 'gyur ba ma mchis lags so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri
189a7(khri brgyad stong pa): brgyad stong pa las/ gnas med pa'i le'u zhes bya ste sum cu rtsa bdun pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di/
189b1(khri brgyad stong pa): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ma mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
189b2(khri brgyad stong pa): rab 'byor nam mkha' med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mnyam pa nyid lags so// bcom
189b3(khri brgyad stong pa): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams cad dmigs su med par mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
189b4(khri brgyad stong pa): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dben pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro//
189b5(khri brgyad stong pa): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rdzi ba ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
189b6(khri brgyad stong pa): stsal pa chos thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin/
189b7(khri brgyad stong pa): pa 'di ni gzhi ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ming med pa dang / lus med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom
190a1(khri brgyad stong pa): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nam mkha' lta bu lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
190a2(khri brgyad stong pa): dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni
190a3(khri brgyad stong pa): brjod du ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par spyod pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis
190a4(khri brgyad stong pa): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ming ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
190a5(khri brgyad stong pa): pa tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i phung po dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
190a6(khri brgyad stong pa): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'gro ba ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'gro
190a7(khri brgyad stong pa): ba med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi 'grogs pa lags so// @#
190b1(khri brgyad stong pa): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad gzung du med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol/
190b2(khri brgyad stong pa): tu phyin pa 'di ni bas pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad shin tu byung zhing zad pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
190b3(khri brgyad stong pa): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni skye ba ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa
190b4(khri brgyad stong pa): med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byed pa po ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan
190b5(khri brgyad stong pa): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byed pa po dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di/
190b6(khri brgyad stong pa): ni shes pa po ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shes pa po dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jo lta ste/
190b7(khri brgyad stong pa): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'pho ba ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa 'chi 'pho dang skye ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis
191a1(khri brgyad stong pa): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin papha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'jigs pa ma mchis pa lags so// bcom
191a2(khri brgyad stong pa): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'jig pa med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
191a3(khri brgyad stong pa): pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rmi lam lta bu lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rmi lam rmis pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol/
191a4(khri brgyad stong pa): pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni brag cha lta bu lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis dka' stsal pa sgra'i brjod pa dmigs
191a5(khri brgyad stong pa): su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mig yor lta bu lags bcom ldan 'dra
191a6(khri brgyad stong pa): kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzugs brnyan dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu
191a7(khri brgyad stong pa): phyin pa 'di ni smig rgyu lta bu lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chu 'bab pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta
191b1(khri brgyad stong pa): ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sgyu ma lta bu lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtshan ma dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor/
191b2(khri brgyad stong pa): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gti mug ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
191b3(khri brgyad stong pa): ma rig pa'i mun pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni kun nas nyon mong/
191b4(khri brgyad stong pa): pa ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom lnga 'das 'di lta ste/
191b5(khri brgyad stong pa): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa yod pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir
191b6(khri brgyad stong pa): ro/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gnas pa ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
191b7(khri brgyad stong pa): stsal pa/ chos thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni
192a1(khri brgyad stong pa): dmigs su ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas gzigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan/
192a2(khri brgyad stong pa): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni spros pa ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ spros pa thams cad yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir/
192a3(khri brgyad stong pa): ro/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rlom sems ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
192a4(khri brgyad stong pa): bka' stsal pa/ rlom sems thams cad yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol/
192a5(khri brgyad stong pa): tu phyin pa 'di ni g.yo ba ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos kyi dbyings gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'dra/
192a6(khri brgyad stong pa): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dod chags dang bral ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad ma nor ba de
192a7(khri brgyad stong pa): bzhin nyid du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par byed pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin
192b1(khri brgyad stong pa): pa 'di ni kun nas ldang ba ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis
192b2(khri brgyad stong pa): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zhi ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nas thams cad/
192b3(khri brgyad stong pa): mtshan ma med cing dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dod chag
192b4(khri brgyad stong pa): ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dod chags kyi mtshan ma dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta
192b5(khri brgyad stong pa): ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zhe sdang ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhe sdang yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// /
192b6(khri brgyad stong pa): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa bam po sum cu pa// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab
192b7(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gti mug ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gti mug gi mun pa rnam par sel ba nyid kyi
193a1(khri brgyad stong pa): phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nyon mongs pa ma mchis
193a2(khri brgyad stong pa): pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yongs su rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
193a3(khri brgyad stong pa): pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sems can ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro//
193a4(khri brgyad stong pa): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das
193a5(khri brgyad stong pa): kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad kun nas sdang ba med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
193a6(khri brgyad stong pa): phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' gnyis su ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor
193a7(khri brgyad stong pa): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ma 'dres pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
193b1(khri brgyad stong pa): chos thams cad 'dros pa med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni naganogapa/
193b2(khri brgyad stong pa): mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa
193b3(khri brgyad stong pa): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par mi rtog pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par
193b4(khri brgyad stong pa): rtog pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshang ma mchis
193b5(khri brgyad stong pa): pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta
193b6(khri brgyad stong pa): ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nam mkha' lta bu lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad nam mkha' ltar chags
193b7(khri brgyad stong pa): pa med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi rtag pa lags so// bcom
194a1(khri brgyad stong pa): ldan 'das kyis pa/ 'a stsal pa/ chos nas byur 'jug pa med bang // rab 'byor gyi sa ga na su y-i
194a2(khri brgyad stong pa): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sdug bsngal ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad lhag par bye ba'i 'os ma yin pa'i phyir ro//
194a3(khri brgyad stong pa): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bdag ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
194a4(khri brgyad stong pa): bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol po/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
194a5(khri brgyad stong pa): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stong pa nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkra' stsal pa/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhinani dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/
194a6(khri brgyad stong pa): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtshan nyid ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams/
194a7(khri brgyad stong pa): cad mtshan ma med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nang stong pa nyid lags so//
194b1(khri brgyad stong pa): na ma ma // ra kyar ma na smra /
194b2(khri brgyad stong pa): sbyin pa par tu b+h+ya pa 'an byasang ba na nas so// btsu na 'as sa / 'phrul hA/ chos na sa sa pa /
194b3(khri brgyad stong pa): bamam ldan 'das 'di la ste/ shes rab kyi pha ram tu phyin pa pa rol tu phyin pa 'don byinang snang ba'id lasasog/ bcom ldan 'dus kyi sa bka' stsal pa/ phying nga ru gi
194b4(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'odadi ni stong pa nyid
194b5(khri brgyad stong pa): pa nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di
194b6(khri brgyad stong pa): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chen po sto pa nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chen po stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor
194b7(khri brgyad stong pa): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ngon dam pa stong pa nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//
195a1(khri brgyad stong pa): don dam pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa
195a2(khri brgyad stong pa): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis
195a3(khri brgyad stong pa): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
195a4(khri brgyad stong pa): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni
195a5(khri brgyad stong pa): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa//
195a6(khri brgyad stong pa): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// thog ma dang /
195a7(khri brgyad stong pa): tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dor ba med pa
195b1(khri brgyad stong pa): stong pa nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ dor ba skyed pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'as
195b2(khri brgyad stong pa): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus byas dang 'dus pa byas kyi chos
195b3(khri brgyad stong pa): dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid
195b4(khri brgyad stong pa): lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di
195b5(khri brgyad stong pa): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
195b6(khri brgyad stong pa): dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi dmigs pa stong pa
195b7(khri brgyad stong pa): nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta
196a1(khri brgyad stong pa): ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dngos po med pa
196a2(khri brgyad stong pa): stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ngo bo nyid stong pa
196a3(khri brgyad stong pa): nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste
196a4(khri brgyad stong pa): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
196a5(khri brgyad stong pa): stong pa nyid dmigs su meng pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dran pa nye bar gan
196a6(khri brgyad stong pa): pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lus dang / tshor ba dang / sems dang / chos dmyigs su me pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol
196a7(khri brgyad stong pa): com ldan das 'dzin kyil tu phyin pa tshun pa 'dzini yang gapar grang ba ldan sa bya
196b1(khri brgyad stong pa): dang mi dge ba'i chos rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis mamol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rol tu phyin pa 'din rdzo/
196b2(khri brgyad stong pa): 'phrul gyi rkang pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dmyigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol te/ bcom ldan
196b3(khri brgyad stong pa): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dbang po lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbang po lnga dmigs su med pa
196b4(khri brgyad stong pa): khyer ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stobs lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
196b5(khri brgyad stong pa): bka' stsal pa/ stobs lnga dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa
196b6(khri brgyad stong pa): 'di ni byang chub kyi yan lag lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol
196b7(khri brgyad stong pa): ba bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni lam lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lam yan lag
197a1(khri brgyad stong pa): brgyad pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin/
197a2(khri brgyad stong pa): stong pa nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lta bar gyur pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab
197a3(khri brgyad stong pa): kyipha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtshan ma ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par rtogs pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis
197a4(khri brgyad stong pa): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni smon pa ma mchis pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ smon lam dumi gras
197a5(khri brgyad stong pa): med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ she so rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
197a6(khri brgyad stong pa): stsal pa/ rnam par thar pa dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni snyoms par 'jug
197a7(khri brgyad stong pa): pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas pa'i sgoms par 'jug pa dgu dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
197b1(khri brgyad stong pa): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'phags pa'i bden pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal bya/ sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gon pa dru /
197b2(khri brgyad stong pa): lam dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sbyin pa lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis
197b3(khri brgyad stong pa): bka' stsal pa/ ser sna dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'dri lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshul khrims la
197b4(khri brgyad stong pa): so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'chal pa'i tshul khrims dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lnga skye/ sa
197b5(khri brgyad stong pa): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bzod pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalo pa/ gnod sems dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa
197b6(khri brgyad stong pa): bcom ldan 'das 'di lnga ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni brtson 'grus lags su// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ le lo migs su med par phyiraro/
197b7(khri brgyad stong pa): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'dis s+ho/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa par phyin pa 'din shes rab legs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis gaka' stsal pa/ 'tsham par
198a1(khri brgyad stong pa): shes rab dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stobs
198a2(khri brgyad stong pa): bcu lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste
198a3(khri brgyad stong pa): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi 'jigs pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//
198a4(khri brgyad stong pa): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lnga ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni so so yang dag par rig pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
198a5(khri brgyad stong pa): bka' stsal pa/ thams cad du ye shes chags pa med cing thogs pa med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
198a6(khri brgyad stong pa): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni snying rje chen po lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis
198a7(khri brgyad stong pa): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
198b1(khri brgyad stong pa): bka' stsal ba/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab tu/
198b2(khri brgyad stong pa): pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni de bzhin nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ brjod pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi mtha' yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab po
198b3(khri brgyad stong pa): 'di spangs pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la dad pa ma mchis pa dang /
198b4(khri brgyad stong pa): dga' ba ma mchis pa dang / dang pa ma mchis pa dang / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sangs rgyas rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos rnams la/ 'di skad du sbyin pa'i pha
198b5(khri brgyad stong pa): rol tu phyin pa la ni ji ltar spyad par bgyi/ tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni ji ltar spyad par bgyi/ nang stong
198b6(khri brgyad stong pa): pa nyid la ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ phyi stong pa nyid la ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la ni
198b7(khri brgyad stong pa): ji ltar bsgom par bgyi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang
199a1(khri brgyad stong pa): po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams la ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs la ni ji ltar bsgom par
199a2(khri brgyad stong pa): bgyi mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi zhes yongs su zhu ba ma bgyis pa'i
199a3(khri brgyad stong pa): slad du'o// // de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa shA ri'i bu de lta ngo mtshar kyang ci che ste/ shes
199a4(khri brgyad stong pa): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu zab pas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par ma gyur pa dang /
199a5(khri brgyad stong pa): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mos par ma gyur pa dang /
199a6(khri brgyad stong pa): nang stong pa nyid la mos par bgyur ba dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gos par mgyur ba dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos su mi surtsa bdun mams par mi myur
199a7(khri brgyad stong pa): sa mi 'jims pa tsam yang ga pa rig pa pamangon par shes paldadang / sangs rgyam gyims pa 'khrim pa ca
199b1(khri brgyad stong pa): par 'gyur bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo'ang spong bar byed pa ni ngo mtshar miche'o/ brgyan pa shA ri'i bu gang gis rab kyi ba pa zus sa pa ni byung
199b2(khri brgyad stong pa): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes la phyag 'tshal ba yin pas na/ bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bdug phyag 'tshal lo// de nas kyi
199b3(khri brgyad stong pa): ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ko'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin to/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal bde ni/ rna
199b4(khri brgyad stong pa): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes la phyag 'tshal ba yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka 'di ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
199b5(khri brgyad stong pa): phyin pa 'dilas nges par byung la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin nyid yin pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
199b6(khri brgyad stong pa): pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rang byung lpags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsal
199b7(khri brgyad stong pa): pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad rnas/
200a1(khri brgyad stong pa): pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i phyir ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ dmigs su med pa'i le'u zhes
200a2(khri brgyad stong pa): bya ste sum cu rtsa brgyad pa'o// / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gi rna lam du shes rab
200a3(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di grags pa de dag kyang / sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa yin la/ gang dag gi rna lam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di grag par 'gyur
200a4(khri brgyad stong pa): pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed cing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa yin na/ gang dag 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba
200a5(khri brgyad stong pa): dang klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzung zhing bcangs la/ bklags shing kun chub par byed/ de bzhin nyid du sgrub par byed pa dag lha mos kyang ci
200a6(khri brgyad stong pa): dgos rigs kyi bu 'ab/ rigs kyi bu mo glang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun rdzob par byed pa dang /
200a7(khri brgyad stong pa): bza 'o// mas shing kun chub par byas na kyang de bzhin thaMd sgrub par byed par dag gis ni/ sangs rgyas par bdag la zhin ra byis pa yin ma/
200b1(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zos nas kyang / mi skrag mi dang shing dngang bar mi 'gyur ba de dag gis ni/ sngon gyi de bzhin/
200b2(khri brgyad stong pa): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la yang yongs su zhu ba byas pa yin no// gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
200b3(khri brgyad stong pa): thos nas kyang / mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ba de dag gis ni bskal pa bye ba phrag ma po dag nas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad cing / tshul khrims dang /
200b4(khri brgyad stong pa): bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa yin no snyam mo// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang /
200b5(khri brgyad stong pa): ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi phyi rol tu phyi pa zlab mo 'di thos nasmra
200b6(khri brgyad stong pa): sgeg mi dang de zhing dang bar rje 'gyur la/ 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid po dang / tshul bzhin du 'di 'tshong bar bgyid pa'i rims kyi bu 'gyu/ rims kyi
200b7(khri brgyad stong pa): khrimi ngan phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chis pa di ltar bzung bar bgyi pa sems/ ci'i mang pa'in/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar shes
201a1(khri brgyad stong pa): sa bgyu sgyu sa
201a2(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i srang du'o// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi pa gang dag shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa rabasngo 'ang spro bar sems pa'i dbyas dru / rigs kyi
201a3(khri brgyad stong pa): dedas rnam pa thams cad ma byed pa nyid kyi ye shes rab tu bskyed pa yin pa'i phyir te/ ko'u shi ka rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'ams
201a4(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya'o// de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes skyed par 'dod pa dang / bag chags dang / mtshabs
201a5(khri brgyad stong pa): sbyor ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad yang dag par 'joms par 'dod pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod
201a6(khri brgyad stong pa): pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya'o// de bzhin du sems can rnams
201a7(khri brgyad stong pa): rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par 'dod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ongo bo'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par 'dod pa dang //
201b1(khri brgyad stong pa): rang byang chub la dgod par 'dod pa dang / sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par 'dod pa dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun yongs su bsdu
201b2(khri brgyad stong pa): bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal
201b3(khri brgyad stong pa): dang bcom ldan 'das la/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
201b4(khri brgyad stong pa): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na rnal 'byor du btsud pa lags/ ji ltar na bsam matan dang / brtson 'grus dang / brjod
201b5(khri brgyad stong pa): chus rnam pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa la gos/ du ska na rnam 'gyur du brtsod pa lags/ ji skar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
201b6(khri brgyad stong pa): ba'i dus byor du babyung ba la/ ngas pa da pa'i na nang slong ba srid kyi sa nga
201b7(khri brgyad stong pa): nga rngubasams dpa sems pa'i tsherna sa ngathar nags rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung / byang chub kyi phyimam thoms tham chum 'jas pa nas bya'i
202a1(khri brgyad stong pa): bgyid pa lags de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad na/ de bzhin gshegs
202a2(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la rnam
202a3(khri brgyad stong pa): 'byor du bgyid pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ko'u shi
202a4(khri brgyad stong pa): gang khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don de yongs su zhu bar sems pa ni legs so legs so// ko'u shi ka khyod kyi spobs pa skye ba de yang / sangs rgyas kyi mthu yin te/
202a5(khri brgyad stong pa): ko'u shi ka de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang / ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o// ko'u shi ka 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
202a6(khri brgyad stong pa): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gzugs la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe gzugs la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ gzugs la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin no// de bzhin
202a7(khri brgyad stong pa): du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe rnam par shes pa la mi gnas po de'i tshe/ rnam par
202b1(khri brgyad stong pa): shes pa la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin no// de bzhin du mig la mi gnas/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la mi gnas te/ de ltar
202b2(khri brgyad stong pa): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pal rnal 'byor du byed do// de bzhin du gzugs la mi gnas/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams la mi gnas te/ 8
202b3(khri brgyad stong pa): ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do// de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas par/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed
202b4(khri brgyad stong pa): do de bzhin du tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas par/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
202b5(khri brgyad stong pa): phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do// nang stong pa nyid la mi gnas par/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la
202b6(khri brgyad stong pa): mi gnas par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mi gnas par/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do//
202b7(khri brgyad stong pa): de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / lam la mi gnas par
203a1(khri brgyad stong pa): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do// tshad med pa bzhi la mi gnas par/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do// bsam gtan bzhi
203a2(khri brgyad stong pa): dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la mi gnas/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
203a3(khri brgyad stong pa): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mi gnas par/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gang la gnas pa dang / gang la
203a4(khri brgyad stong pa): rnal 'byor du byed pa'i gzugs de dmigs su med pa dang / de bzhin du gang la gnas pa dang / gang la rnal 'byor du byed pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams/
203a5(khri brgyad stong pa): dang rnam par shes pa dang / de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs
203a6(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
203a7(khri brgyad stong pa): 'dres pa bco brgyad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs la sbyor bar mi byed de/ gang gi
203b1(khri brgyad stong pa): phyir gzugs la sbyor bar mi byed pa de ltar/ gzugs la rnal 'byor du byed do// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la
203b2(khri brgyad stong pa): sbyor bar mi byed do/ gang gi phyir rnam par shes pa la sbyor bar mi byed pa de ltar/ rnam par shes pa la rnal 'byor du byed do// de bzhin du bya sa thams dang skye bached dru dang / rje
203b3(khri brgyad stong pa): cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams
203b4(khri brgyad stong pa): dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sbyor bar mi byed do// gang gi phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sbyor bar mi
203b5(khri brgyad stong pa): byed pa de ltar/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la rnal 'byor du byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/ gzugs
203b6(khri brgyad stong pa): sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ gzugs phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ gzugs da ltar byung bar mi dmigs shing / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams
203b7(khri brgyad stong pa): dang rnam par shes pa sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ rnam par shes pa phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ rnam par shes pa da ltar byung bar mi dmigs la/ de bzhin du khams
204a1(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / stong /
204a2(khri brgyad stong pa): pa nyid thams cad dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sngon gyi mthar mi
204a3(khri brgyad stong pa): dmigs/ phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ da ltar byung bar mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces
204a4(khri brgyad stong pa): gsol do// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab po lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid zab
204a5(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa yin no// shA ri'i de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid
204a6(khri brgyad stong pa): zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa yin no// shA ri'i bu de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang
204a7(khri brgyad stong pa): pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
204b1(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa yin no// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab/
204b2(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gting dpag dka' ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu gzugs gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
204b3(khri brgyad stong pa): pa gting dpog dka' ba yin no// shA ri'i bu de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi 'o
204b4(khri brgyad stong pa): rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka' ba yin no// shA ri'i bu de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams
204b5(khri brgyad stong pa): dang stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs
204b6(khri brgyad stong pa): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka' ba yin no// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan
204b7(khri brgyad stong pa): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshad ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu gzugs tshad med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
205a1(khri brgyad stong pa): tshad med pa yin no// shA ri'i bu tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa tshad med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
205a2(khri brgyad stong pa): byin pa tshad med pa yin no// shA ri'i bu de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / song
205a3(khri brgyad stong pa): nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mI 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig po rnams dang / sangs rgyas
205a4(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams tshod med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med pa yin no// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na
205a5(khri brgyad stong pa): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bus byang chub sems dpa'
205a6(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' chen po gal te gzugs zab ces bya bar mi spyod no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
205a7(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zab ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang /
205b1(khri brgyad stong pa): rkyen cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / sti 'jigs pa rnams dang / sos yang dag par /
205b2(khri brgyad stong pa): rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams zab ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ring bu 'ang
205b3(khri brgyad stong pa): ltar gzugs kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin la/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'dra byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa
205b4(khri brgyad stong pa): de ni rnam par shes pa yin zhing / de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /
205b5(khri brgyad stong pa): stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs
205b6(khri brgyad stong pa): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
205b7(khri brgyad stong pa): spyod pa yin pa'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ gal te gzugs gting dpag dka' zhes bya
206a1(khri brgyad stong pa): bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes
206a2(khri brgyad stong pa): pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel
206a3(khri brgyad stong pa): par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang //
206a4(khri brgyad stong pa): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di
206a5(khri brgyad stong pa): ltar gzugs kyi gting dpag dka' ba nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin la/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i
206a6(khri brgyad stong pa): gting dpag dka' ba nyid gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa ma yin zhing / de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung
206a7(khri brgyad stong pa): ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams/
206b1(khri brgyad stong pa): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi gting dpag dka' ba nyid mang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma yin no zhes bya bar mi spyod na//
206b2(khri brgyad stong pa): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin pa'i phyir te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi gting dpag dka' ba nyid gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos
206b3(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams ma yin pa'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gal te gzugs tshad med do
206b4(khri brgyad stong pa): zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa
206b5(khri brgyad stong pa): tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs kyi tshad med pa nyid gang yin pa de ni
206b6(khri brgyad stong pa): gzugs ma yin la/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i tshad med pa nyid gang yin de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin zhing / de bzhin du
206b7(khri brgyad stong pa): khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
207a1(khri brgyad stong pa): chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi tshad
207a2(khri brgyad stong pa): med pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
207a3(khri brgyad stong pa): shA ri'i bu 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi tshad med pa nyid gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma yin pa'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan
207a4(khri brgyad stong pa): 'dres shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni de tsam du zab pa dang / de tsam du gting dpag dka' ba dang / de tsam du rtogs par dka' ba dang / de tsam du tshad ma mchis pa lags te/
207a5(khri brgyad stong pa): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mdun du bshad par mi bgyi ste/ de dag gis
207a6(khri brgyad stong pa): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos na skrag cing dngangal dngang bar 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun
207a7(khri brgyad stong pa): du bshad par bgyi ste/ des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos na mi skrag mi dngang la dngang bar mi 'gyur zhing / nem nur bgyid par mi 'gyur/ the tshom 'tshal bar mi
207b1(khri brgyad stong pa): 'gyur ba'i steng du thos nas kyang mos par 'gyur ba lags so// / de nas lha'i dbang po 'argya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa shA/
207b2(khri brgyad stong pa): ri'i bu theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du/ gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad na nyes pa cir 'gyur/ shA ri'i bus
207b3(khri brgyad stong pa): smras pa/ ko'u shi ka theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du/ gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad par thar na/
207b4(khri brgyad stong pa): skrag cing dang ngal dngang bar 'gyur zhing / phyir ldog pa dang / phyir spong bar 'gyur te/ mos par mi 'gyur la/ ko'u shi ka gang gi phyir theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems
207b5(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos na/ phyir spong zhing log par ltung bar 'gro ba la sogs par 'gyur te/ de yun ring po nas kyang bla na med pa yang
207b6(khri brgyad stong pa): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i gnas de yod do// brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lung
207b7(khri brgyad stong pa): ma bstan pa gang dag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos na/ mi skrag mi dngang zhing dang bar mi 'gyur ba lnga yod dam/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ ko'u shika byang chub sems
208a1(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos na/ mi sgrub mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ba de dag ni ring
208a2(khri brgyad stong pa): por mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa 'thob par 'gyur te/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gam/ gnyis las mi 'da' ba'i bar gyis/
208a3(khri brgyad stong pa): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstun pa 'thob par 'gyur ba yin no// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsam/
208a4(khri brgyad stong pa): pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di zos na/ mi sdug/
208a5(khri brgyad stong pa): mi rungang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ba'i steng du/ thos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed cing ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi
208a6(khri brgyad stong pa): pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par 'gyur ba de dag ni yun ring po nas/ theg pa la yang dag par zhugs shing / pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas mang
208a7(khri brgyad stong pa): po la bsnyen bkur byed byed pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dpe
208b1(khri brgyad stong pa): brjod par bdag shin tu spobs lags so// bde bar gshegs pa bdag spobs lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu khyod spobs par gyis shig
208b2(khri brgyad stong pa): shA ri'i bras gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na thag pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo zhig gi galar
208b3(khri brgyad stong pa): lam du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brjod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
208b4(khri brgyad stong pa): pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa dang / byang chub sems kyi snying po la mchis pa'i bar dag rmis par gyur na
208b5(khri brgyad stong pa): bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye bar gyur pa lags par rig par bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das
208b6(khri brgyad stong pa): gang dag seng pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol
208b7(khri brgyad stong pa): tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
209a1(khri brgyad stong pa): sangs rgyas shing / mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang / byang chub kyi snying po la mchis shing / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor byar sems pa'i
209a2(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye bar 'gyur ba la spos kyang ci 'tshul te/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/ rig
209a3(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi bu mo gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mnyam pa'i slad du/ skyed cing thos nas kyang de bzhin nyid du sgrub par bgyid pa de dag ni/ dbye ba'i rtsa ba
209a4(khri brgyad stong pa): yongs su smin pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas 'dzin pa dang
209a5(khri brgyad stong pa): 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag ni/ yun ring po nas theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa dang / dge
209a6(khri brgyad stong pa): ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa dang / sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur bgyis pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa lags so// bcom ldan byang chub sems
209a7(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' rnams dang / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rnyed par 'gyur zhing / rnyed par gyur nas kyang 'dzin pa dang /
209b1(khri brgyad stong pa): 'byung ba dang / thob pa dang / na chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du ying la bgyid pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am bya rigs kyi bus de dag na med pa yang
209b2(khri brgyad stong pa): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan du'i ba 'am/ lung bstan par 'gyur ba 'am/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phy-ir mi ldog par
209b3(khri brgyad stong pa): lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper bgyid na mi zhig 'brog dgon pa dpag tshad brgya pa zhig nas byung bar gyur tam/ 'brog dgon pa dpag tshad nyis rgya
209b4(khri brgyad stong pa): pa zhig nas sam/ dpag tshad sum brgya pa zhig nas sam/ dpag tshad bzhi brgya pa zhig nas sam/ dpag tshad lnga brgya pa zhig nas byung bar gyur nas/ de byung ba'i
209b5(khri brgyad stong pa): grong khyer gyi lnga lngas ba glang rdzi dag gam/ phyabra rdzi dag gam sa mtshams sam/ kun dga' ra ba 'am/ tshal dag gam/ skyed mos tshal dang mthong bar gyur la/
209b6(khri brgyad stong pa): grong khyer gyi lnga ltas grong dag gam/ grong rdal dag gam/ ljongs dag gam/ yul 'khor drag gas/ mtshan ma gzhan dag gang yang rung ba dag mthong bar gyur na/ de 'di snyam du snga sbas 'di lta bu
209b7(khri brgyad stong pa): 'di dag snang ba las na/ 'di nas grong dang / grong rdal dang / grong khyer dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang dang nye bar 'gyur ro snyam nas dbugs phyin par/
210a1(khri brgyad stong pa): 'gyur zhing / de la spyan chad chos kun gyis 'jigs pa 'am/ gdug pas 'jigs pa 'ab/ gdol pas 'jigs pa 'phru/ gsan rdun tshwa chos
210a2(khri brgyad stong pa): 'jigs pa 'am/ bkres pa dang / skom pas 'jigs pa dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
210a3(khri brgyad stong pa): chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rnyed par 'gyur zhing / rnying par gyur nas kyang 'dzin par bgyida'aching bar bgyid/ slob par bgyid/ kun chub par bgyid
210a4(khri brgyad stong pa): tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni lung bstan du nye ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub/
